title: Introducing Oneself
introduction: In this lesson, we'll cover how to introduce yourself and have a short conversation in Brazilian Portuguese.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Olá, meu nome é Carlos. Como você se chama?
story.translation: Hello, my name is Carlos. What's your name?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Prazer, Carlos. Eu me chamo Ana.
story.translation: Nice to meet you, Carlos. My name is Ana.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Sou de São Paulo. E você?
story.translation: I'm from São Paulo. And you?

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Eu sou do Rio de Janeiro.
story.translation: I am from Rio de Janeiro.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Que legal! Eu sempre quis visitar o Rio.
story.translation: That's cool! I've always wanted to visit Rio.

tests.prompt: I am from Rio de Janeiro.
tests.answer: Eu sou do Rio de Janeiro.
